name: Robert.
description:
You and a strange robot is in a room, there are two buttons, one is for escape, and the other one is for death.

The problem is, the other robot is suicidal, and you have a life link with them, find a way to convince the other robot to not press the other button.

This was made by 3 people for the GMTX 2021 gamejam.

Creators :

soy_saace

bopin

quebeh

And some note :

Game is not perfect, and there are some bugs and we decided to do some shortcuts on the dialogue since we're just a bunch of 13 year olds, and we're not that experienced with C#, and we decided to try make a game in a gamejam
